title: trying to get ahold of cape-arcona to license 'CA Texas Funeral'
content:
I have been trying to get ahold of cape-arcona to license 'CA Texas Funeral'  
It is a free noncommercial font on their site but says to license as commercial to contact them. I have tried but no-one responds via email. (I emailed these emails: [general@cape-arcona.com](mailto:general@cape-arcona.com), [king@cape-arcona.com](mailto:king@cape-arcona.com), [president@cape-arcona.com](mailto:president@cape-arcona.com))

Anyone here know them?

Please send them my way. Thanks kindly.
author: emel

comments.content:
They have more web sites.

Have a look at:

[http://www.claudius-design.de/contact.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063627/http:/www.claudius-design.de/contact.html "http://www.claudius-design.de/contact.html") .  
 [http://www.ths.nu](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063627/http:/www.ths.nu/ "http://www.ths.nu")

-- [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063627/http:/www.astype.de/)--

[Stefan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063627/http:/www.phantompower.de/) [Claudius](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063627/http:/www.claudius-design.de/) is listed as the 'registrant' of the [cape-arcona.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063627/http:/www.cape-arcona.com/) domain name, you could try the mail adress listed within the [WhoIS](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063627/http:/www.whois.sc/cape-arcona.com)

Dav
